Deflection.name: Deflection
descriptions: Increases your Parry chance by 1%.
Increases your Parry chance by 2%.
Increases your Parry chance by 3%.
Increases your Parry chance by 4%.
Increases your Parry chance by 5%.

Benediction.name: Benediction
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of your Judgement and Seal spells by 3%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Judgement and Seal spells by 6%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Judgement and Seal spells by 9%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Judgement and Seal spells by 12%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Judgement and Seal spells by 15%.

Long Arm of the Law.name: Long Arm of the Law
descriptions: Increases the range of your Judgement spell by 5 yards, and decreases the cooldown by 1 sec.
Increases the range of your Judgement spell by 10 yards, and decreases the cooldown by 2 sec.

Grand Crusader.name: Grand Crusader
descriptions: Increases your attack speed by 2% after using Crusader Strike. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 15 seconds.
Increases your attack speed by 4% after using Crusader Strike. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 15 seconds.
Increases your attack speed by 6% after using Crusader Strike. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 15 seconds.

Domination.name: Domination
descriptions: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Dominance Aura by 5%.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Dominance Aura by 10%.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Dominance Aura by 15%.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Dominance Aura by 20%.
Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Dominance Aura by 25%.

Precision.name: Precision
descriptions: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 1%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 2%.
Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 3%.

Conviction.name: Conviction
descriptions: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 1%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 2%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 3%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 4%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 5%.

Seal of Command.name: Seal of Command
descriptions:
Fills the Paladin with the spirit of Command, granting melee attacks a chance to deal additional Holy damage equal to 70% of normal weapon damage. Lasts 30 seconds.

Unleashing this Seal's energy will judge the target, granting allies a Seal of Command while causing all allies who strike a judged enemy to gain Seal of Command. Your melee strikes will refresh the duration.

Only one Seal can be active per Paladin at any one time.

Pursuit of Justice.name: Pursuit of Justice
descriptions: Increases the movement speed bonus of your Seal of Justice by 5%, and passively increases your mounted movement speed by 5%.
Increases the movement speed bonus of your Seal of Justice by 10%, and passively increases your mounted movement speed by 10%.

Iron Maiden.name: Iron Maiden
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Retribution Aura by 33%, and gives your Retribution Aura a 3% chance to stun any attackers for 2 seconds.
Increases the damage done by your Retribution Aura by 66%, and gives your Retribution Aura a 6% chance to stun any attackers for 2 seconds.
Increases the damage done by your Retribution Aura by 100%, and gives your Retribution Aura a 10% chance to stun any attackers for 2 seconds.

Two-Handed Weapon Specialization.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
descriptions: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 2%.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 4%.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 6%.

Repentance.name: Repentance
descriptions: Puts the enemy target in a state of meditation, incapacitating them for up to 1 minute.  Any damage caused will awaken the target.  Only works against Humanoids.

Vengeance.name: Vengeance
descriptions: Gives you a 3% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for 8 seconds after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability.
Gives you a 6% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for 8 seconds after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability.
Gives you a 9% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for 8 seconds after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability.
Gives you a 12% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for 8 seconds after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability.
Gives you a 15% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for 8 seconds after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability.

Holy Cleave.name: Holy Cleave
descriptions: You imbue your weapon with Holy strength, cleaving enemies in front of you on your next attack. Affects up to 4 targets.

Kingdom.name: Kingdom
descriptions: Your critical strikes with melee attacks increase the attack power of nearby allies by 10% for 10 seconds.

The Art of War.name: The Art of War
descriptions: Your critical strikes with melee attacks have a 33% chance to cause your next Flash of Light spell to cost no mana and cast instantly.
Your critical strikes with melee attacks have a 66% chance to cause your next Flash of Light spell to cost no mana and cast instantly.
Your critical strikes with melee attacks have a 100% chance to cause your next Flash of Light spell to cost no mana and cast instantly.

Inquisition.name: Inquisition
descriptions: Victims of Repentance are 33% more likely to be critically struck. In addition, your Seal spells are 33% less likely to be dispelled.
Victims of Repentance are 66% more likely to be critically struck. In addition, your Seal spells are 66% less likely to be dispelled.
Victims of Repentance are 100% more likely to be critically struck. In addition, your Seal spells are 100% less likely to be dispelled.
